title: Self-Directed Science Competency Enhancement Course Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and professional field-related practical experience
context.additional_context: Development of work-integrated science competencies for professionals in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can develop and implement self-directed learning plans based on Heutagogy principles in blended learning environments.
Learners can understand core concepts in science with an achievement rate of 85% or higher using mobile microlearning content.
Learners can improve collaborative problem-solving competencies by 70% through peer feedback systems on digital platforms.
Learners can diagnose individual knowledge gaps and develop compensatory strategies by analyzing learning data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
